info.title: Page2images Website Thumbnail
info.description: Send us a url. We return the image of it. Support iPhone, Android & iPad.

parameters.name: p2i_device
parameters.description: Our system can generate the screenshot for those smart phones and desktops. Please pass it to server as needed. Following are devices we supported: 0 - iPhone4, 1 - iPhone5, 2 - Android, 3 - WinPhone, 4 - iPad, 5 - Android Pad, 6 - Desktop

parameters.name: p2i_fullpage
parameters.description: Full page or just the screen area. If the value is 1 or true, we will take the full page screenshot. If the value is 0 or false, we will take the screen area only.

parameters.name: p2i_imageformat
parameters.description: png or jpg We strongly recommend jpg since most jpg file is smaller than png.

parameters.name: p2i_refresh
parameters.description: We will cache the screenshot result for 24 hours. If you does not want to use the cache, please set this value to 1.

parameters.name: p2i_screen
parameters.description: The screen size of device you want to simulate. Format: screen_widthxscreen_height e.g. 1024x768 We predefined the size for those devices for most usage: Mobile: 320x480 Mobile iPhone5: 320x500 Tablets: 1024x768 Desktop: 1280x800 Advanced information: 1) The screen size should not be less than image size.

parameters.name: p2i_size
parameters.description: The thumbnail file size you want to get. Not the screen size of device. If you want a big image, you need enlarge the width and height. If you need a small one, you need reduce the width and height. But it will take some more time to download a big image than a small one. Format: widthxheight e.g. 300x300  We predefined the size for those devices for most usage: Mobile Phones: 320x480 Tablets: 512x384 Desktop: 640x400  Advanced information: 1) If you only know the fixed width or height of the images you want to get, you can just pass the width or height to us by following format: 512x0 or 0x512. We will resize the image to fit that width/height and make sure it is the biggest image we can generate. 2) The screenshot image will be resized to fit the width and height without stretching

parameters.name: p2i_url
parameters.description: URL of target page. Do not need to be encode. Valid inputs: www.google.com google.com http://www.google.com https://www.google.com

parameters.name: p2i_wait
parameters.description: How many second wait after page load complete. System will not accept the value less than 30 seconds.
